::Zardus/Demolition/Havoc::

Zardus recieves Punch's transmission, replying to it. "Yes, we have 
arrived at the Iron Fist. How are things in the base?"

He arrives at a lab door, entering it along with Demolition and Havoc.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> The Oblitercons/Unitron/Sixshot/Nemesis 
Enforcer/Scattershot/Ares/Demon 
> Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/Serpentor/Punch:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Punch felt the base shake, and looked around.  He activated his 
comm. unit.  
> "Zardus, this is Punch.  What was that shaking?  Did we just get 
attacked?"
> 
> ===
> 
> Unitron and Dark One flew back with the other shuttles, sent to 
pick up the 
> Alliance ground forces.
> 
> ===
> 
> Nemesis Enforcer transformed to his beast mode, the bat mode with a 
thirty 
> foot wingspan, and with a mightly flap of his leathery wings, he 
lifted off 
> into the air, heading for the Iron Fist.
> 
> ---
> 
> Scattershot transformed to his bald eagle mode, lifting off into 
the air, 
> following Nemesis.
> 
> ---
> 
> Sixshot stopped as the shuttles touched down, the hatches opening.  
Sixshot 
> and Ares rolled into a shuttle, transforming to biped modes.  
Sixshot set 
> Minion on the ground, and sat down himself.
> 
> ---
> 
> Demon Wulf, Flesh Ripper, and Dark Claw walked inside the same 
shuttle with 
> Sixshot and Ares, sitting down and waiting.
> 
> ---
> 
> Serpentor slithered into the other shuttle, transforming to robot 
mode, 
> sitting down, internal repairs complete.  He looked up as 
Breakdown, Hiss, 
> Pryo, and Scavenger walked into the same shuttle and took their 
seats.
